Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_21.jpg'}
{3: 'As Lamia deftly avoids Lithos, the lost soul trapped in the depths of the pit begin their own battle to break free and flee.'}
{2: '(Attempt to wriggle free from the restraints once more)', 3: '5'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Your limbs are trapped by shackles, firmly anchored to the table and the floor, granting only limited movement to your upper body.'}
{3: "Luckily, the shaky sensation suggests the handcuffs aren't securely fastened. If not for this weakened body, it is possible to break free through sheer strength alone."}
{3: 'Time to find a tool.'}
{2: '(Extract the fork from your hand with your teeth)', 3: '11'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_22.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_22.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Biting down on one end of the fork and pulling hard, you feel a sharp pain shoot through the back of your hand.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{2: '(Wedge the fork into the gap between the handcuffs and the table)', 3: '25'}
{2: 'This should do it...', 3: '28'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_22.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'Just as a glimmer of hope appears, exhaustion hits like a ton of bricks, blurring your vision.'}
{3: 'Maybe Lithos was right about the fish. A quick bite might restore some stamina.'}
{2: '(Lean in again and press the fork handle down with your chin)', 3: '38'}
{3: 'The shackles remain immovable.'}
{2: '(Give it another shot)', 3: '42'}
{3: 'Awkwardly changing angles and gritting teeth, you press down again and finally feel the fork sink, only to see its handle bent into an arc.'}
{3: 'Shaking your head to clear your blurred vision, you realize sweat has begun to bead on your forehead.'}
{3: 'Ever since resolving to step onto the battlefield, you have never allowed your body to reach such a state of weakness.'}
{3: 'Knowing that there is no turning back and you have been harboring an unspoken lie, you must work harder than those with innate talent.'}
{3: 'If not for being in this predicament, all of this would have remained a secret.'}
{3: 'Shaking off these thoughts, you calm your chaotic breathing, adjust your posture, and press down on the fragile fork once more.'}
{2: '(Mind the angle...)', 3: '57', 4: '(Stay with me, fork!)', 5: '57'}
{3: 'The fork screeches, prying at the joint bit by bit.'}
{2: 'Just a little... more...', 3: '61'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Clang! The base of the fork suddenly breaks into two, and your cheek is cut by the broken edge due to inertia.'}
{3: 'Fortunately, the handcuffs loosen significantly.'}
{2: '(Struggle to break free)', 3: '67'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Vigorously shaking your wrists, you finally pull out the handcuffs along with the nails on them.'}
{3: 'After moving your newly freed hand to wipe the blood off your face, you shift your focus to the other hand.'}
{2: '(Pick up the broken fork)', 3: '73'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory787.jpg'}
{3: 'With one hand freed, the rest of the escape goes much smoother.'}
{2: '(Work on the shackles on the legs next)', 3: '78'}
{3: 'You bend down to inspect the shackles fixed to the floor and find them to be very sturdy but locked with a simple lock, which could be picked with a simple tool.'}
{2: "Looks like I'll have to use this fork again.", 3: '80'}
{3: 'Could Lithos have overlooked that this fork would help your escape?'}
{3: 'What he said and how he said it all point to one thing—this is a game planned in cahoots with the defectors from Babylonia.'}
{3: "The game didn't start now—it began the moment you boarded that doomed transport craft."}
{2: '...', 3: '85', 4: 'First, focus on now. Forget about those things.', 5: '85'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "The moment the shackles fall off due to the fork's tampering, slow footsteps approach from outside."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 2: '2'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "Lithos steps into the room, spots the discarded shackles on the table, and isn't surprised in the slightest."}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Hiding so quickly?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'It seems those with memories are more stable, immediately knowing what they should do.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Those with memories?)', 3: '103'}
{3: 'Twirling his long hair around his finger and wandering around the room, Lithos never opens the cabinet or searches under the table.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He whispers softly, edging closer to your hiding spot.'}
{3: 'It turns out that in the haste to hide, a drop of your blood inadvertently fell nearby.'}
{3: 'He stops in his tracks beside that drop of blood.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'What should I do now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "It's even more dangerous out there...", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Has he not noticed?)', 3: '116'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Besides those children, Loki is there too. Running into her would be troublesome...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "But this is our last chance for Project Cthylla. Mister won't allow us to fail.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He mutters to himself, resting his hand against the wall.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Cthylla? Cthylla...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'No. Mr. Monster, can you hear me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The wall behind you suddenly becomes scorching hot.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'I know it\'s hard, but please, you must help Cthylla control her "cradle"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'We must stop Loki from leaving that area at any cost.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns his head in the direction of your gaze, revealing a meaningful smile.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "Paper Crane, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After his footsteps fade away, silence reclaims the space as if the burning sensation behind just now was but a bluff to intimidate.'}
{3: 'Barely able to support your body, you creep through the narrow crevice, realizing then how drained and feeble your body is.'}
{3: 'The same feelings hit you after you sustained injuries in the battle at the Pulia Forest Park Ruins, followed by a prolonged coma.'}
{2: 'If only Gray Raven were here...', 3: '137'}
{2: 'If they were here...', 3: '138'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, your wounds...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reaching out toward her figure, you only grasp the afterglow of light.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 2: '2', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab'}
{2: '...A hallucination?', 3: '150'}
{3: 'Your state of confusion grows, unsure if the anomaly lies within yourself or in this mysterious space.'}
{3: 'You shake your head again, clearing the chaos from your mind.'}
{2: "Now's not the time for nostalgia and sorrow.", 3: '153'}
{2: "They're still searching for me. I must hurry back.", 3: '154'}
{2: "Can't let them worry for too long.", 3: '155'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory796.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'While the Gray Raven Commandant hunts for an exit unarmed, a weathered soldier hurries past the grim alley in the amusement park.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'It is the third survivor to fall into the pit—Shorthalt of Scarab.'}
{3: 'How did Shorthalt come to this?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'He still remembers the day he left the squad, when the Scarab Commandant, Valeria, called him into the operation room for a confidential mission.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Project Cthylla? What's so important about a crazy project that was terminated long ago?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "That theory and experiment might have been unthinkable during the Golden Age, but it's different for Ascendants. Hetero-Creatures have provided new possibilities."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Any news?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Yeah, here's what we got from the Science Council and the Purifying Force. Hetero-Creatures are sprouting new variations, namely—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Give me the gist. I can't handle lengthy reports.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The brass wants us to scope out these spots for anyone the Purifying Force is after.'}
{3: 'She taps the terminal screen on the table with her fingertips.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Why can't the Purifying Force handle it themselves?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Those folks are all about secrecy, darting from one spot to the next.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Ah, so they've got stealth scouts among them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Exactly, which is why this stays between us. We're hitting the road in two hours, splitting up, and sharing any intel pronto."}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "I've got a hunch someone's about to strike gold."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Stay sharp, Shorthalt. Don't go poking your head out of a manhole only to stumble upon a bunch of Ascendants worshipping the Red Tide.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Hmph, like that would ever happen to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory796.jpg'}
{3: "Shiva's gut feelings are always dead-on."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory222.png'}
{3: "Just as she foresaw, that nondescript spot turned out to be one of Lithos' bases, where Shorthalt was caught in an ambush during his investigation."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory220.png'}
{3: 'Barely dodging the trap, he was double-crossed by a defector pretending to help, sending him back into the abyss.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory107.png'}
{3: 'To bait Valeria into a rescue, the defector scattered his severed limbs in conspicuous spots, while Lithos kept him captive.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory796.jpg'}
{3: 'After waking from a long coma, he has spent ages rummaging through piles of rubble for spare parts and weapons, hunting for an escape route.'}
{3: 'In this twisted maze, he has wandered for endless days, losing track of time.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory793.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Shorthalt briefly puts down his weapon, leans against the corner, and slips a liquor-filled peppermint candy from the bottom of his pocket into his mouth.'}
{3: "Valeria had given it to him before they split up. She knows Shorthalt has a soft spot for these little treats, though she isn't one to dole them out herself."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "This mission's dicey. Don't get stuck in a fight too long."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "If there's no progress in three days, come back, and we'll brainstorm a fresh strategy."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "You're not brushing off Shiva's words, right? I won't return empty-handed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Fine. If you're missing in three days, I'll send Wanshi that video of you cuddling a medic bot, sloshed."}
{3: 'That was the parting shot from Commandant Valeria.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory796.jpg'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Wonder if I can score a memory fragment wipe for a friend.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Crunching on the sweet, Shorthalt gears up for a recon trip down south, only to catch hurried footsteps nearby.'}
{3: "In a flash, he's face to face with a somewhat familiar human, trailed by a monstrous Hetero-Creature."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Get down!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He pulls the already weary human into a tight hug, then lunges forward to jab the creature with his weapon.'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{3: 'Red liquid splatters, and the monster drops.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'What a surprise, finding the Gray Raven Commandant here in this shithole.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "I'm Shorthalt from Scarab.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Oh? You know me? I'm flattered.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I heard from Bianca that you had passed away.', 3: '279'}
{2: 'Why are you here?', 3: '281'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "It's a long story.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He pulls out a candy from his pocket, contemplating eating it, then tossing it over.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Take it. You'll need the energy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Had I known there were survivors, I'd have brought more.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He lets out a sigh as he briefly recounts what he went through.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "The small purple Ascendant didn't off me, just chopped me up and dumped me in a heap of rubble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Commandant Valeria didn't expect me to be alive, did she? What about you?", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Briefly recount what you went through)', 3: '290'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'The transport craft to Babylonia had an accident?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Seems like some folks are driven to desperate measures, willing to do anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you mean?', 3: '293'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Those who escaped the Purifying Force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How long have you been stuck here?', 3: '295'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Hard to say. Time doesn't seem to exist in this place. I figure it's been over a month, most of it spent knocked out cold.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Any luck finding a way out in that time?', 3: '297'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Transport vehicles bring people in every now and then, but they're heavily guarded by Ascendants and all sorts of Hetero-Creatures, making them tough to approach.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'And lately, those vehicles have vanished altogether.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it always this chaotic here?', 3: '300'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Chaotic doesn't even begin to describe it. You see those illusion-like doors and floors too?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: '**** me, this place is like a maze, with doors floating all over, leading to who knows where.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Some are labs, others are orphanages, and there are even underground waterways. I thought my M.I.N.D. was playing tricks on me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'But since you can see them too, it means this place has some serious real-world simulation going on.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Maybe it's tied to Lithos.", 3: '306'}
{2: '(Or maybe it\'s because I\'m undergoing "M.I.N.D.ification.")', 3: '307'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Yeah, Lithos has been popping up a lot lately. Every time I run into her, she pulls some slick move and vanishes, neither attacking nor letting me attack.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "And believe it or not, when I'm at my lowest, she shows up to lend a hand, like I'm her pet or something.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Can't trust a word that guy says. You'd be smart not to take his words at face value.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "She's all about deception and manipulation, so watch your back.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Hmph, can't believe she fed you that line about Gray Raven already rescuing your clone. Total hogwash. You've only been gone a few days, and your clone couldn't have grown up that fast and fooled Gray Raven, could it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Even if those researchers have ways to speed up a clone's growth, it couldn't be that rapid.", 4: '1'}
{2: "True enough... You've got a point.", 3: '315'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Since we seem to be in this together, I've got a favor to ask.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Connect my M.I.N.D. I've been wandering around here for so long, my M.I.N.D. is turning into mush.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie1New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie3New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie4New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie1New.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie3New.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie4New.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'With the M.I.N.D. connection established, Shorthalt lets out a long sigh of relief.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Ah, that's much better.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Hmm... Your Mind Beacon feels different from Commandant Valeria's.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Every time I connect with her, I feel this restlessness, like I wanna pick a fight with someone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Your Mind Beacon has this calmness that's way beyond your years. We should take it slow and not rush into things, which suits me just fine.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He chuckles heartily, giving you a friendly pat on the back with his big hand.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Oh, sorry about that. Didn't realize you were hurt.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shorthalt regards you, whom Commandant Valeria had described as someone noteworthy, with the kind of look one gives to a patient.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "You're a lot different from what I imagined. I thought you'd be more of a tough-as-nails soldier type.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "But hey, when you're stuck in a place like this, you gotta face reality.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "For now, let's treat you like someone who's wounded. Take it easy and don't push yourself too hard like you used to. Keep that in mind, okay?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "So, what's the plan now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can you reach out to the outside world?', 3: '347'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'My terminal got tossed ages ago, along with all that junk in the disposal channel, and turned into scrap metal. Yours probably met the same fate.', 4: '1'}
{2: "But I've got a tiny micro-terminal.", 3: '349'}
{2: 'Lee gave it to me for emergencies.', 3: '350'}
{2: "It's hidden in the hem of my jacket, and might still be there unnoticed.", 3: '351'}
{3: "Even if there's no signal 5000 meters under the sea, there might be some messages on the terminal that could come in handy."}
{2: '(Lithos was the one who shared the information, so it might not be accurate...)', 3: '353'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'And here I was wondering why you were dressed so lightly. Turns out you got stripped down.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just lost the jacket.', 3: '355', 4: "Let's not say things that could be taken the wrong way.", 5: '355'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Alright, let's head back and find it. There might be some usable weapons in that pile of debris, better than you going unarmed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright.'}
